title: MRP exceeds wage, hire more workers

content.prompt: Assume that a firm is hiring labor in a perfectly competitive labor market. If the marginal revenue product of labor is greater than the wage rate, which of the following will be true?

choices.label: The firm should replace workers with capital.
The firm is experiencing diminishing marginal utility.

topic.text: 5.3: Profit-Maximizing Behavior in Perfectly Competitive Factor Markets
